name: Womens 'Flirtn Betty' Black or White PETTICOAT
description:
Stunning 'flirtn betty' petticoat. Gives your rockabilly dresses and 1950s rock n roll skirts a lovely shape when worn underneath. This petticoat has 4 tiers and 2 layers to give more fullness than the 'vintage demure' petticoat. Standard waist stretches from 60-105cm (one size fits most). Petite waist stretch 50-90cm. 55cm long.  Great for people who would like a lovely petticoat shape to their dress or skirt, with a little fullness.

The 'Flirtn Betty' was developed in response to the growing number of general fashion wearers seeking petticoats. For customers looking for a fun flirty fashionable look! This two layer petticoat featuring a ruffle trim has a satin topped tier with 3 additional tiers below of high quality chiffon.

Petticoat Manufacturer Manufacturers and direct suppliers of the world's biggest selling petticoat brands - Spin Dance, Flirtn Betty, Vintage Demure.  Not since the 50's have petticoats been as popular and sought after as they are today. Trends are seeing the petticoat demanded more and more as a general fashion wear garment. Rockabilly, Vintage wear and Alternative fashion fans are all wearing petticoats and the petticoat is now the must have fashion accessory in every girl's wardrobe !

name: Womens 'Spin Dance' Black Full PETTICOAT
description:
The 'Spin Dance' standard petticoat is the world's biggest selling petticoat. Thousands of happy customers are wearing the Spin Dance petticoat to accommodate a wide range of fashion requirements. Constructed in comfortable high quality organza fabric for maximum fullness and finished with ribbon edging all all layers. The result is a very light weight and very floaty petticoat that dancers love for its ability to achieve a horizontal spin line when dancing. Vintage wear and 50's fashion wear customers take advantage of the fullness achieved under their dresses and rock n roll skirts. Whether dancing or just wearing for fun, all enjoy the lightweight floaty feel of the classic Spin Dance petticoat. 55cm long with 3 tiers and 2 layers. Standard size fits most - waist stretches from 60-105cm.

Petticoat Manufacturer Manufacturers and direct suppliers of the world's biggest selling petticoat brands - Spin Dance, Flirtn Betty, Vintage Demure.  Not since the 50's have petticoats been as popular and sought after as they are today. Trends are seeing the petticoat demanded more and more as a general fashion wear garment. Rockabilly, Vintage wear and Alternative fashion fans are all wearing petticoats and the petticoat is now the must have fashion accessory in every girl's wardrobe!

name: Womens CHOCOLATE cotton rock and roll skirt
description: Womens handmade rock and roll (full circle) skirt, handmade in Melbourne, Australia by Sandra V. Made from 100% cotton light pink fabric with chocolate print.

name: Womens BLACK POODLE skirt handmade in Australia.
description: Womens handmade rock and roll/poodle skirt, handmade in Melbourne, Australia by Sandra V. Made from red polycotton with a white sewn on poodle.

name: Womens RED POODLE skirt handmade in Australia.
description: Womens handmade rock and roll/poodle skirt, handmade in Melbourne, Australia by Sandra V. Made from black polycotton with a white sewn on poodle.
